title: [Question] Resources to study EVS?
content: The EVS ISA is on Saturday and I need resources to study. I have the ppt's and the notes, but I need more stuff. Anyone has any good resources for the same?

comments.body: I don't think anyone used a resource to study it from in my batch. Someone found a question bank, we just studied the questions from those and it was sufficient
Bruh you don‚Äôt need any ‚Äúresources‚Äù for EVS. it‚Äôs literally 3rd-grade level knowledge
I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if someone asked for more resources for something like physics but evs??
One question in our ESA had a picture of a mosquito and asked if it causes cancer, diabetes, dengue, or flu. You tell me.
Just go through slides once and qb
Wait are you not in BTech ??Cause our ISAs begin later.
I don't think it's for Btech. Probably a non btech course.
QB isn't enough for EVs, it is enough for constitution tho

Just put the slides and ESA PYQ's(download them from PESU OPAC) in NotebookLM and then just ask it to sort the pyqs topic wise saves time of going through those slides 5o percent questons repeat with ddifferent wordings and some almost the same also same goes for constitution for chem cycle.  
Hope this helps
